nodes.text: Brollyx was an Assistant-Viceprex employed by the Corporate Sector Authority's Security Division and stationed on Etti IV. When she chose to sue the Imperial Entertainers' Guild for the destruction of the Stars' End penal facility, her decision was met with a considerable degree of protest from the Guild. Hokkor Long, the Guild's Secretary in charge of scheduling, dispatched a number of textfiles to Brollyx, in which he protested the treatment that the Guild's members were forced to endure at social functions sponsored by the Authority, and reiterated that the Guild was not responsible for the prison's destruction, nor could it be held responsible the actions of Han Solo, Atuarre, Pakka and Bollux when they had posed as members of the Guild in order to infiltrate Stars' End.
